About v1.0

Discovery is an elasticsearch site plugin to visualize OpenStreetMap
data, indexed using the elasticsearch-osmosis-plugin.

It uses these (really!) great plugins:

  • jQuery and Bootstrap for the UI
  • Leaflet to render MapQuest open tiles
  • And elastic.js to query elasticsearch node

This plugin is licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0.
